title: Can't get in to any matches
body:
I can't do anything after the champion select screen. As soon as everyone is locked in the load screen comes up, full black, and then nothing. After a minute or 2 I will get an error prompt and an error message.
Unable to connect to server retry / cancel. Nothing I have tried to fix this has worked.
I've rebooted, then re-launched the client but when I choose reconnect the same thing happens again. Black screen and error message.
I have tried making 1vs1 bot matches and same problem.
The bitch of it is that it first happened last night just as I was trying to start a 5v5 pvp match.

replies.body: I have the same issue, its completely ridiculous that this is happening. The whole time my internet connection is flawless, can open web browsers and log in with 0 issues, but loading screen keeps on doing the same thing. No matter how many times I try, just the same thing and no matter what I do it results in a loss and a leave for my account. This is very frustrating and I hope Riot can at the very least look into this issue or acknowledge that they are aware its happening. I will keep my eye out for any info on this issue.

You may want to write in a ticket then if the KB didn't help. I have went to them with tech issues before and they always get them workout out for me. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new {{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

Have you guys tried Riot's Connection KB to see if this fixes the issue? I can link you guys to it: http://riot.com/12B7oac I'll be on for a bit if you wanna reach out so I can try to help you. {{champion:25}} {{item:3001}}

As described on the linked page http://riot.com/12B7oac

I added all 5 files to the firewall and disabled IPV6 
It let me get in to a custom 1v1 bot match but then I tried a PVP 5v5 and it black screened with the same error message...

I have now taken every step described on the linked page and none of them have worked.
I can start a 1v1 bot match but nothing else
I have the same issue as well... I got 2 low priority ques for it, and having to wait 20 minutes because of it, just for it to happen again isn't fun.
